TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpCacheAgeControl extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the meaning of time values that control caching behavior for resources obtained using <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by members of the <xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy> class to configure the time values for cache policies.
## Examples The following code example creates a policy based on MaxAgeAndMinFresh.
[!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#9](../../add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.net.cache.httpc_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[NclSimpleCache#9](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.net.cache.httpc_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Cache.HttpCacheAgeControl MaxAge = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Content can be taken from the cache until it is older than the age specified with this value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Cache.HttpCacheAgeControl MaxAgeAndMaxStale = int32(6)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Cache.HttpCacheAgeControl MaxAgeAndMinFresh = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Cache.HttpCacheAgeControl MaxStale = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Content can be taken from the cache after it has expired, until the time specified with this value elapses.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Cache.HttpCacheAgeControl MinFresh = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Content can be taken from the cache if the time remaining before expiration is greater than or equal to the time specified with this value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Cache.HttpCacheAgeControl None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: For internal use only. The Framework will throw an T:System.ArgumentException?qualifyHint=False
